name: STATES FOR PASSENGER RAIL COALITION
description: State and regional passenger rail trade association
sampleDescriptions: Support for federal funding for intercity passenger railroad projects, programs, and state planning and development capacity. Advocacy related to the creation and sustainability of USDOT-FRA grant pro

Support for federal funding for intercity passenger railroad projects, programs, and state planning and development capacity. Advocacy related to the creation and sustainability of USDOT-FRA grant pro
Introductions to Members of Congress. Issues related to the provision of intercity rail passenger services along the Northeast Corridor and National Network (no bill number).
